The following datasets were utilised in this project to inform decision-making and analysis.

| Dataset Name | Source                           | Description                   |
|--------------|----------------------------------|-------------------------------|
| Dataset A    | [gov.example](https://gov.example) | Contains city zoning info     |
| Dataset B    | [solar.org](https://solar.org)     | Solar radiation measurements  |
| Dataset C    | [Survey](https://example.com/survey) | On-site inspection results    |
